title: Hawaiian feather cape- meterials and meaning

content.prompt: The material and manufacturing process of the Hawaiian ‘ahu ‘ula shown served to

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
